title: Lockheed Martin teams with Iceye to advance AI-enabled targeting
key_assets: ['AI-powered target recognition technologies', 'Iceye’s synthetic aperture radar (SAR) imagery', 'Lockheed Martin’s automated target recognition (ATR) algorithms', 'Finland’s F-35 tactical aviation program integration']
summary: Lockheed Martin has partnered with Iceye, a Finnish Earth observation company, to develop AI-powered target recognition technologies for Finland’s military. The collaboration leverages Iceye’s SAR imagery and Lockheed Martin’s ATR algorithms to enhance space-based intelligence and analytics for Finland’s F-35 program. The technology aims to provide near real-time actionable intelligence for mobile ISR systems.
why_it_matters: This partnership highlights the growing integration of commercial space capabilities into military applications, particularly in AI-driven intelligence and reconnaissance. It also underscores the strategic collaboration between U.S. defense contractors and European space companies to enhance NATO allies' defense capabilities.

entities.name: Lockheed Martin
